td.i: You gain immunity to disease and petrification.
You can reroll a wisdom ability check or saving throw once per long rest. You must declare you are using this ability after you roll and you cannot reroll a critical failure.
You can dispel the frightened or charmed condition on an ally once per long rest.

While raging you can expend an amount of health to recharge a spell usage from this subclass. To recharge Enemies Abound you must sacrifice 1/9th of your total health, to recharge Phantasmal Killer you must sacrifice 1/6th of your total health, and to recharge Geas you must sacrifice 1/3rd of your total health. This ability can only be used once per long rest.

When you hit an enemy while raging you have a chance to silence them. The enemy has to make a saving throw of DC 8 + your strength modifier + your proficiency bonus or be silenced until the end of their next turn. This ability can only target 1 enemy and can only be used once successfully per short rest.
You can ignore spell components for a spell provided by Path of the Devoid once per long rest.
You gain +1 to your strength ability score.
